description: This is a college/university level course in contemporary Christian theology through a video lecture series which will last about a standard semester [about four weeks]. The student will be able to understand the mujerista theology of the late Ada María Isasi-Díaz and its significance and consequences for the Church of Jesus Christ and Christian theology in the twenty-first century. The student is advised to already have a basic understanding of Christian theology before taking this course. The textbook for this course will be my book La Teología Mujerista: A Christian Minister Examines the Mujerista Theology of Ada María Isasi-Díaz which can be easily obtained at online bookstores.
title: The Mujerista Theology of Ada María Isasi-Díaz: A Study
